name: Vin World
description:
This game tells the story of a man who got into another world. The idea of the project is mainly taken from the popular game - Undertale.

The passage will take you no more than two hours, and if you pass it, please rate it.

The main character sees a lot of interesting characters, locations and dialogues on his way.

And one more unusual fact about the game. This was done in a PowerPoint program. Therefore, its launch will not be a problem for anyone.
